mapper.sql: TRX_DETAIL_ID, TRX_ID,STATUS, ORGANIZATION_ID, SUBINVENTORY_ID, LOCATOR_ID, ITEM_ID, LOT_NUMBER, EXPIRY_DATE, PACKING_TYPE, NUMBER_OF_CARTON, NUMBER_OF_IND_CARTON, REMAINING_IND_AFT_CAR, TRX_QTY,SOURCE_LINE_ID, REMARK, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15
mapper.insert:
select INV_TRANSFER_TRX_DETAIL_S.nextval from dual
insert into INV_TRANSFER_TRX_DETAIL (TRX_DETAIL_ID, TRX_ID, STATUS,ORGANIZATION_ID, SUBINVENTORY_ID, LOCATOR_ID, ITEM_ID, LOT_NUMBER, EXPIRY_DATE, PACKING_TYPE, NUMBER_OF_CARTON, NUMBER_OF_IND_CARTON, REMAINING_IND_AFT_CAR, TRX_QTY,SOURCE_LINE_ID, REMARK, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15) values (#{trxDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{trxId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{locatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{packingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberOfCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{numberOfIndCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remainingIndAftCar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{trxQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{sourceLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update INV_TRANSFER_TRX_DETAIL
TRX_ID = #{trxId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUBINVENTORY_ID = #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOCATOR_ID = #{locatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRY_DATE = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PACKING_TYPE = #{packingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUMBER_OF_CARTON = #{numberOfCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NUMBER_OF_IND_CARTON = #{numberOfIndCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMAINING_IND_AFT_CAR = #{remainingIndAftCar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRX_QTY = #{trxQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOURCE_LINE_ID = #{sourceLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TRX_DETAIL_ID = #{trxDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update INV_TRANSFER_TRX_DETAIL set TRX_ID = #{trxId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUBINVENTORY_ID = #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOCATOR_ID = #{locatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRY_DATE = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PACKING_TYPE = #{packingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUMBER_OF_CARTON = #{numberOfCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUMBER_OF_IND_CARTON = #{numberOfIndCarton,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMAINING_IND_AFT_CAR = #{remainingIndAftCar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRX_QTY = #{trxQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SOURCE_LINE_ID = #{sourceLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TRX_DETAIL_ID = #{trxDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT #{inTrxId} TRX_ID, t2.STATUS, t1.TRANSFER_ORG_ID organizationId, t2.SUBINVENTORY_ID, t2.LOCATOR_ID, t2.ITEM_ID, t2.LOT_NUMBER, t2.EXPIRY_DATE, t2.PACKING_TYPE, t2.NUMBER_OF_CARTON, t2.NUMBER_OF_IND_CARTON, t2.REMAINING_IND_AFT_CAR TRX_QTY, T2.TRX_DETAIL_ID SOURCE_LINE_ID, t2.TRX_DETAIL_ID outTrxDetailId, t2.TRX_QTY outTrxQty, t2.REMAINING_IND_AFT_CAR remainingQty, item.ITEM_NUMBER itemNumber, item.ITEM_NAME itemName, item.UOM_CODE itemUomCode FROM INV_TRANSFER_TRX t1, INV_TRANSFER_TRX_DETAIL t2, INV_ITEM_B item
t1.TRX_ID=#{outTrxId} AND t2.TRX_ID=T1.TRX_ID AND t2.ITEM_ID=item.ITEM_ID
AND item.item_number like concat(UPPER(#{itemNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND t2.TRX_DETAIL_ID NOT IN
#{outTrxdDetailIds}

SELECT IIB.ITEM_NUMBER, IL1.LOT_NUMBER, IL1.EXPIRY_DATE FROM INV_LOT IL1, INV_ITEM_B IIB WHERE IL1.ORGANIZATION_ID = #{transferOrgId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}--转入orgId AND IL1.ITEM_ID = #{itemId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}--商品id AND IL1.LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}--批次号 AND IL1.ITEM_ID = IIB.ITEM_ID AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM INV_LOT IL2 WHERE IL2.ITEM_ID = IL1.ITEM_ID AND IL2.LOT_NUMBER = IL1.LOT_NUMBER AND IL2.ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}--转出orgId AND IL1.EXPIRY_DATE != IL2.EXPIRY_DATE ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM INV_TRANSFER_TRX_DETAIL ITTD WHERE ITTD.TRX_ID = #{trxId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}--转出单id AND ITTD.ITEM_ID = IL1.ITEM_ID AND ITTD.LOT_NUMBER = IL1.LOT_NUMBER AND ITTD.ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}--转出orgId AND ITTD.EXPIRY_DATE != IL1.EXPIRY_DATE ) )

SELECT IIB.ITEM_NUMBER, IL1.LOT_NUMBER, IL1.EXPIRY_DATE FROM INV_LOT IL1, INV_ITEM_B IIB WHERE IL1.ORGANIZATION_ID = #{transferOrgId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}--转入orgId AND IL1.ITEM_ID = #{itemId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}--商品id AND IL1.LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}--批次号 AND IL1.ITEM_ID = IIB.ITEM_ID AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM INV_LOT IL2 WHERE IL2.ITEM_ID = IL1.ITEM_ID AND IL2.LOT_NUMBER = IL1.LOT_NUMBER AND IL2.ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}--转出orgId AND IL1.EXPIRY_DATE != IL2.EXPIRY_DATE ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM INV_TRANSFER_TRX_DETAIL ITTD WHERE ITTD.TRX_ID = #{trxId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}--转入单id AND ITTD.ITEM_ID = IL1.ITEM_ID AND ITTD.LOT_NUMBER = IL1.LOT_NUMBER AND ITTD.ORGANIZATION_ID = #{transferOrgId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}--转入orgId AND ITTD.EXPIRY_DATE != IL1.EXPIRY_DATE ) )
